add-point-intent -t IPV4 -p 200 SwitchId/InPort SwitchId/OutPort

# Clients
## First access, always to right

add-point-intent -p 500 -s 00:00:00:00:00:01 of:0000000000000001/3 of:0000000000000001/1

add-point-intent -p 500 -s 00:00:00:00:00:02 of:0000000000000002/3 of:0000000000000002/2

add-point-intent -p 500 -s 00:00:00:00:00:03 of:0000000000000003/3 of:0000000000000003/1

## Dest Final

add-point-intent -p 400 -d 00:00:00:00:00:01 of:0000000000000001/2 of:0000000000000001/3

add-point-intent -p 400 -d 00:00:00:00:00:02 of:0000000000000002/1 of:0000000000000002/3

add-point-intent -p 400 -d 00:00:00:00:00:03 of:0000000000000003/2 of:0000000000000003/3


## Repass 

add-point-intent -p 300 -d 00:00:00:00:00:02 of:0000000000000001/2 of:0000000000000001/1

add-point-intent -p 300 -d 00:00:00:00:00:03 of:0000000000000002/1 of:0000000000000002/2

add-point-intent -p 300 -d 00:00:00:00:00:01 of:0000000000000003/2 of:0000000000000003/1


# Servers
## First access, always to right

add-point-intent -p 200 of:0000000000000001/4 of:0000000000000001/1

add-point-intent -p 200 of:0000000000000002/4 of:0000000000000002/2

add-point-intent -p 200 of:0000000000000003/4 of:0000000000000003/1

## Dest Final

add-point-intent -p 100 -s 00:00:00:00:00:06 of:0000000000000001/2 of:0000000000000001/4

add-point-intent -p 100 -s 00:00:00:00:00:04 of:0000000000000002/1 of:0000000000000002/4

add-point-intent -p 100 -s 00:00:00:00:00:05 of:0000000000000003/2 of:0000000000000003/4


###########################################################################################

add-point-intent -p 500 of:0000000000000001/3 of:0000000000000001/1

add-point-intent -p 500 of:0000000000000002/3 of:0000000000000002/2

add-point-intent -p 500 of:0000000000000003/3 of:0000000000000003/1

add-point-intent -p 400 -d 00:00:00:00:00:01 of:0000000000000001/2 of:0000000000000001/3

add-point-intent -p 400 -d 00:00:00:00:00:02 of:0000000000000002/1 of:0000000000000002/3

add-point-intent -p 400 -d 00:00:00:00:00:03 of:0000000000000003/2 of:0000000000000003/3

add-point-intent -p 300 -d 00:00:00:00:00:02 of:0000000000000001/2 of:0000000000000001/1

add-point-intent -p 300 -d 00:00:00:00:00:03 of:0000000000000002/1 of:0000000000000002/2

add-point-intent -p 300 -d 00:00:00:00:00:01 of:0000000000000003/2 of:0000000000000003/1

add-point-intent -p 200 of:0000000000000001/4 of:0000000000000001/1

add-point-intent -p 200 of:0000000000000002/4 of:0000000000000002/2

add-point-intent -p 200 of:0000000000000003/4 of:0000000000000003/1

add-point-intent -p 100 -s 00:00:00:00:00:06 of:0000000000000001/2 of:0000000000000001/4

add-point-intent -p 100 -s 00:00:00:00:00:04 of:0000000000000002/1 of:0000000000000002/4

add-point-intent -p 100 -s 00:00:00:00:00:05 of:0000000000000003/2 of:0000000000000003/4
